Simulate Misaligned Spatial Data

Source: R/simulation.R
simulate_misaligned_data.Rd

Simulate Misaligned Spatial Data

Usage

simulate_misaligned_data(
  res1 = c(5, 5),
  res2 = c(10, 10),
  seed = 2,
  dist_covariates_x = c("normal", "poisson", "binomial"),
  dist_covariates_y = c("normal", "poisson", "binomial"),
  dist_y = "poisson",
  x_intercepts = rep(0, 3),
  y_intercepts = rep(0, 3),
  x_correlation = 0.5,
  y_correlation = 0.5,
  beta0_y = NULL,
  beta_x = NULL,
  beta_y = NULL
)

Arguments

res1

Resolution for coarser grid (default = c(5, 5))

res2

Resolution for finer grid (default = c(10, 10))

seed

Random seed (default = 2)

dist_covariates_x

Distribution types for X covariates

dist_covariates_y

Distribution types for Y covariates

dist_y

Distribution type for outcome

x_intercepts

Intercepts for X covariates

y_intercepts

Intercepts for Y covariates

x_correlation

Correlation structure for X (default = 0.5)

y_correlation

Correlation structure for Y (default = 0.5)

beta0_y

Intercept for outcome model

beta_x

Coefficients for X covariates

beta_y

Coefficients for Y covariates

Value

List containing gridy, gridx, atoms, and true_params
